preparation: 1. Cook the ground beef and onion in a skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally until browned and cooked through.
2. Place one taco shell on each plate
3. Divide the ground beef between the shells, and top with the lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
1. In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, onion, carrots, peas, and garlic. Stir well.
2. In a separate bowl, combine the sesame oil, eggs, and water. Stir well.
3. Pour the egg mixture into the onion-carrot mixture. Stir well.
4. Stir fry rice in a wok or skillet over medium-high heat until the rice is tender, about 3 minutes.
5. Pour the egg mixture into the rice. Stir well.
2. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
3. Roll out dough to desired size.
4. Add a thin layer of bbq sauce
5. Add cheese, ham, pineapple and red onions.
6. Bake for 15 mins. Remove from oven and add chopped cilantro.
